findings.title: Public Inputs Encoding Unused
findings.description: The aggregate_public_inputs function generates a constraint system variable pi which is effectively unused besides these initial constraints.

findings.title: Encoding of Goldilocks Field Elements
findings.description: In aggregate_public_inputs, there is an explicit assumption on the width of the Goldilocks field elements which could lead to encoding issues. A Goldilocks field element greater than 56 bits could overwrite bits of earlier public input elements.

findings.title: Potential encoding issue
findings.description: In aggregate_public_inputs, there is an explicit assumption on the width of the Goldilocks field elements which represent the public input. This leads to a potential encoding issue.
